title: Collateral Distribution Status Item
description: Individual collateral item with distribution status information

distributionCommandNumber.description: Number assigned by the Central Depository for each type of collateral.

collateralIdentification.description: Collateral identification as known by party. Its identification is generated by the requesting party

quantity.description: Quantity requested to distribution with command

operationValue.description: Amount requested to the distribution with command

collateralValue.description: Collateral accepted value after taking into account the haircut.

collateralCommandDistributionStatus.description: This block contains information on the status of each type of collateral used in the distribution command
